AwardExperience.GainedExperienceInfo: {actorName} just gained an experience check in {itemName}!
AwardExperience.ItemDoesntHaveExperienceError: Attempt to AwardExperience to the item named "{itemName}" with id "{itemId}" that does not have the "hasExperience" property.
AwardExperience.ItemNotFoundError: Attempt to AwardExperience to an item with id "{itemId}" that could not be found on the actor named "{actorName}" with actor id "{actorId}".

Combat.StrDexMinsNotMetTip: Character does not meet STR and/or DEX minimums for this weapon.  Use at half skill chance.
Combat.StrMinNotMetTip: Character does not meet STR minimum for this weapon. Use at half skill chance.
Combat.DexMinNotMetTip: Character does not meet DEX minimum for this weapon. STR over STR minimum can make up for this at two points of STR for one point of DEX, or use at half skill chance.

Gear.CurrencyConversionTipLunar: Lunars are the standard basis of currency.

confirmItemDeleteDialog.title: Delete {itemType}: {itemName}
confirmItemDeleteDialog.content: Are you sure you want to delete the {itemType} named {itemName}?
confirmItemDeleteDialog.contentCult: Are you sure you want to delete the {itemType} named {itemName}? This will also delete all of the {runeMagicSpell} items associated with this {itemType}.

improveAbilityDialog.title: Improvement for {typeLocName} "{name}"
improveAbilityDialog.noExperienceCheckExplanation: This character does not have an experience check in this {typeLocName} and may not improve from Experience.
improveAbilityDialog.skillOver75Explanation: You may not train in skills with a value over 75%.
improveAbilityDialog.speciesMaxExplanation: You are at or above the species maximum for {name} and may not gain any more.

experienceRoll.flavor: {actorName} makes an experience improvement check for {typeLocName} "{name}"
experienceRoll.contentSkill: Roll 1d100 and add the skill category modifier ({mod}) and gain if the modified roll is HIGHER than the {typeLocName} "{name}" value {skillChance}% or 100.
experienceRoll.contentOther: Roll 1d100 and gain if the roll is HIGHER than the {typeLocName} "{name}" value of {chance}%
experienceRoll.contentChar: Roll 1d100 and gain if the roll is LOWER THAN OR EQUAL TO {chanceToGain}%.  This is based on the Species Maximum for the Characteristic of {speciesMax} minus the Characteristic "{name}" value of {chance} times five.

experienceGainFailed.content: {actorName} failed to learn from experience and the experience check has been cleared from {typeLocName} "{name}".

researchRoll.flavor: {actorName} makes a research improvement check for {typeLocName} "{name}"
researchRoll.contentChar: Roll 1d100 and gain if the roll is LOWER THAN OR EQUAL TO {chanceToGain}%.  This is based on the Species Maximum for the Characteristic of {speciesMax} minus the Characteristic "{name}" value of {chance} times five.

notifications.noExperience: {actorName} does not have an experience check in {typeLocName} "{name}" and cannot gain from experience now.

RuneMagicCard.MissingJournalLinkTitle: Edit the spell and add a description to have a journal link here!
RuneMagicCard.OneUseWarningTip: Casting this spell will reduce both your current and maximum Rune Points for the cult!
RuneMagicCard.getActorFromIdsWarning: Couldn't get actor from actor id or token id.
RuneMagicCard.noSelectedRuneWarning: Attempt to roll a Rune Magic Spell with no Rune selected on the card.
RuneMagicCard.resultMessageCritical: The spell takes effect and costs no Rune Points and {magicPointBoost} Magic Points from boosting.
RuneMagicCard.resultMessageSpecial: The spell takes effect and costs {runePointCost} Rune Points and {magicPointBoost} Magic Points from boosting.
RuneMagicCard.resultMessageSuccess: The spell takes effect and costs {runePointCost} Rune Points and {magicPointBoost} Magic Points from boosting.
RuneMagicCard.resultMessageFailure: The spell fails to take effect but no Rune Points are lost.  If boosted with Magic Points, one is lost.
RuneMagicCard.resultMessageFumble: The spell fails to take effect and {runePointCost} Rune Points are lost.  If boosted with Magic Points, one is lost.
RuneMagicCard.SpentOneUseRunePoints: {actorName} spent {runePoints} One Use Rune Points from the {cultName} cult!
RuneMagicCard.validationNotEnoughMagicPoints: Not enough magic points left to boost that much!

HitLocations.settingHint: The hit location names are used in dropdowns for armor coverage and when naming a new hit location.

DefaultItemIcons.settingLabel: Configure Default Icons for new Items
DefaultItemIcons.settingHint: Set the default icons used when creating new items.

RunesCompendium.settingHint: The runes in the specified compendium will be used in the system. Please include all possible runes.

FumbleRollTable.settingHint: The name of the Fumble roll table - will be used in combat

SpecialCrit.settingHint: *** Alpha version - not fully implemented *** Adds the possibility to roll a special critical (skill/100) and hyper critical (skill/500)

MagicRuneName.settingHint: If a Rune Magic Spell has this rune it is considered "Common", and an adventurer can cast it using any of the cult runes associated with the rune point(s) they spend.

SystemMigrationVersion.settingHint: Do not touch this unless you really know what you are doing!

general.erroractor: No actors defined in the world

augmentingAbilities.title: Augmenting Abilities (RQG)
augmentingAbilities.augFlavour: Using {augName} ({augBase}%) for augmentation. Rolled {augRoll}% on a modified skill of {augValue}%, a {augLabel}
augmentingAbilities.skillFlavour: Rolling {skillName} ({skillBase}%) augmented with {augName}. Rolled {skillRoll}% on a modified skill of {skillValue}%, a {skillLabel}

characteristicRolls.title: Characteristic Rolls (RQG)
characteristicRolls.flavourString: Rolling {charNam} ({charVal} x {charMul}). Rolled {charRoll}% on a modified probability of {charValue}%, a {charLabel}

hitlocationRolls.title: Hit Location Rolls (RQG)
hitlocationRolls.contentString: Rolled a {skillRoll}, a hit at the {locTable}

opposedRolls.title: Opposed Rolls (RQG)
opposedRolls.activeFlavour: Opposed test, active ability: {activeName} ({activeBase}%) versus pasive ability {pasiveName} ({pasiveBase}%)
opposedRolls.pasiveFlavour: Results: {activeName} ({activeBase}%) versus {pasiveName} ({pasiveBase}%)

resistanceTable.title: Resistance Table (RQG)
resistanceTable.flavourString: Rolling {charNam} ({charVal}) against a target number of {charTar}. Rolled {charRoll}% on a modified probability of {charValue}%, a {charLabel}

strikeranksHelper.title: Strike Ranks Helper (RQG)
strikeranksHelper.actorHint: Name of the actor linked to the selected token
strikeranksHelper.dexsrHint: DEX strike rank of the actor
strikeranksHelper.sizsrHint: SIZ strike rank of the actor
strikeranksHelper.generalIndependentHint: this action is independent, do not add to the last entry at the CT, adds it as if it were new
strikeranksHelper.generalReadinessHint: adds readiness to the action (+5 SR)
strikeranksHelper.combatAttackHint: Shows only equipped and natural weapons
strikeranksHelper.magicSpellsHint: rune spells goes at SR 1, rest goes on DEX SR, you have to ready a new spell after the first one
strikeranksHelper.magicMPsHint: number of extra MPs used to augmenting the spell, adds +1SR for each MP above the first one
strikeranksHelper.otherReadyHint: before being able to perform an action, or draw a weapon, or ready a spell after casting another one
strikeranksHelper.otherMovementHint: one SR for every 3m of movement
strikeranksHelper.otherAimedHint: all those actions goes at the end, at SR 12
strikeranksHelper.otherOtherHint: other action, you have to specify the SR
strikeranksHelper.removeTokensHint: list of entries/tokens at the CT, use the button to update the dropdown after adding/deleting combatants
strikeranksHelper.removeDescHint: removes all SR, only blank ones (without SR), or specific SR entries, from a token or for all of them
